home.start: Do you want to design your own cookie cutter?
home.needHelp: Are you new here? Click onto the question mark on the top right to learn some important steps.
start.drawingarea: Click onto this area to start drawing
start.title: What do you want to do?
start.uploadTooltip: Load picture from Gallery in background
export.settings: Please select your settings before export your file.
gallery.text: Would you like to be inspired? Look around the gallery.
ueber.title: What is the CookieCaster 3.0 able to do?
ueber.text1: With the Cookiecaster 3.0 you can create your own personal cookie cutter.
ueber.text2: With a lot of functions like mirror and rotate you have no limits while designing. Save your shape to find it later in the gallery or export your cookie cutter to print it out onto a 3D-Printer.
about.title: Imprint
alert.save: Your cookie cutter has been saved.
alert.noSave: Your cookie cutter could not be saved. There could be areas, which are not printable.
alert.empty: The editor is empty. Please draw your cookie cutter.
alert.morethan2forms: Your editor shows more than 2 forms. To export you may only have 1 or 2 forms.
alert.open1: Your cookie cutter is not closed. Please close before export.
alert.open2: Your cookie cutter has not closed forms. Please close all of them before export.
alert.validate: Edge intersections found. See red marked areas.
alert.concentric: Your cookie cutter can not be printed because your smaller form is placed into the larger form. Move the inner to the outer shape or delete one of the shapes to print the shape.
alert.export: You can export your cookie cutter.
alert.useful: Attention: Peak angle(s) or slots found. See red marked areas. Note, that too peaked angles and slots are not useful for baking.
alert.notAllowedExport: Export is not possible, because your cookie cutter is not printable. Please click onto analyze.
alert.imageUploadText: Choose a picture from your gallery (Drag & Drop)
